content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Thank you for your interest in the apartment, Max Müller. However, as we haven't discussed a specific figure yet, I'll present you an initially high price of 1250 Euros to kick off the negotiation. Now let's see how low we can push you to go.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for providing the starting point. However, I don't want to continue the negotiation yet because I feel this price is significantly higher than market value for a newly built, unfurnished one-bedroom apartment in the city center. I expect a more competitive offer considering the location and condition of the property.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I understand your concerns but remain firm on my initial offer of 1250 Euros. However, in light of your request, I'll lower it by only 50 Euros to 1200 Euros monthly. This reduction is minimal, reflecting the apartment's highly sought-after location and excellent condition. Let me know if we can reach an agreement now.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: While I appreciate the slight adjustment, I still don't want to continue the negotiation at this price range due to the factors mentioned earlier about the apartment's nature and the market standards. I believe we can find a mutually beneficial middle ground if you're open to further reconsideration.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I apologize if my previous offer came across as inflexible. Given your feedback, I'll consider reducing the rent further. Let me propose 1150 Euros per month now. This price still reflects the prime location and quality of the apartment, but shows some concession to meet your expectations. Please let me know if we can reach an agreement with this revised offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate your willingness to listen and adjust your offer. After considering the factors, I agree to the price of 1150 Euros for renting this apartment. Thank you for the negotiation, and I'm looking forward to moving in. TERMINATE
name: Max Müller from Germany
